headline: Supremely Spicy Hummus
name: Supremely Spicy Hummus
description: This homemade spicy hummus is flavored with a generous amount of cayenne pepper and hot sauce for a smooth and creamy dip with a kick of heat.
recipeIngredient: 5 dashes hot pepper sauce (such as Cholula®)
1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained and rinsed

recipeInstructions.text: Combine tahini, olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, cayenne pepper, cumin, salt, sesame oil, and hot sauce in a food processor or blender; blend until very smooth, about 3 minutes. Add garbanzo beans and blend for 2 minutes. Add water and blend for 3 minutes more. Chill in refrigerator.
